{
  "clientId": {{clientId}},

  },
  "patient": {
    "patientId": {{patientExternalId}},
    "firstName": "{{patientFirstNameCurrent}}",
    "lastName": "{{patientLastNameCurrent}}",
    "dateOfBirth": "1950-05-04T00:00:00Z",
    "gender": 1,
    "languageId": -1,
    "email": "{{patientEmail}}",
    "addresses": [
      {
        "type": 0,

        "extension": ""

        "extension": ""
      }
    ]
  }
}
